author: Mackenzie Frazier
title: Dell laptop sale: the XPS 13 laptop gets a $277 price cut
description: We've rounded up the best deals at Dell which include the XPS 13 laptop that's on sale for $1,549.99.
content: If you're looking to upgrade your machine now that you're working from home for the foreseeable future - we're here to help. Dell is discounting a number of best-selling laptops, monitors, webcams, and printers like the powerful XPS 13 laptop that's on sale f… [+4135 chars]
